pages.name: Reagents
pages.title: Using Reagents
pages.text: Using $(l:resources/mermaids_brush)Mermaid's Gems$() as a base instead of $(item)Blaze Powder$() results in a much more reactive potion. Not only does this allow you to add your personal range of additional magical ingredients, but also use some of them as additional Reagent. Each of those Reagents has a unique effect on the $(item)Potion$(). Each Reagent can only be used once per recipe.

pages.title: Order of Application
pages.text: The order in which you arrange the reagents does not matter.$(br2)$(bold)Flat bonuses are applied first, multiplicative ones second.
2x multiplicative Duration bonus.
Flat +1 Potency.
Creates $(item)Splash Potions$().
Creates $(item)Lingering Potions$() - also requires $(item)Gunpowder$() as reagent$(br2)Allows you to create $(item)Tipped Arrows$(), if you supply $(item)Arrows$() instead of $(item)Bottles$().
Makes Effects not show any particles when active.
Increases Duration by flat 60 seconds.
1.25x multiplicative Potency bonus.
Adds a very weird taste and smell, making the Potion unidentifiable.$(br)Also colors it completely black.
Transforms all negative Effects to their positive ones.
1.2x multiplicative bonus to both Duration and Potency.
Flat +1 Potency for all negative Effects.
Flat +1 Potency, at the cost of adding a random negative Effect.
Adds a random positive Effect.
75% chance to add the main Effect of the Potion that was brewed before.
Guaranteed to add the main Effect of the Potion that was brewed before, but at slightly decreased Potency.
Dramatically increases the Potions Potency at the beginning, makes its potency wear off over time.
Negates the duration penalty for $(item)Lingering Potions$() as well as for $(item)Tipped Arrows$().
Gives a huge boost to a random stat.
Triples the potions Duration at the cost of Potency.
Increases Yield, allowing you to brew two additional potions.
Flat +1 to Potency and adds 30 seconds to Duration, but drastically lowers Yield.
Makes the Potion much more smooth, resulting in it being way faster to drink. Might come in handy when every second is crucial.
1.5x multiplicative boost to Potency, at the cost of Duration. Lowers Yield.
+1 Potency for positive Effects. Colors the Potion in a random color.
Triples the Potion's duration, but makes the Potion much slower to drink.
Greatly reduces the Potency of negative effects or nullifies them entirely.
Increases the Duration of positive effects by 120 seconds.
10% chance to add the main Effect of the Potion that was brewed before with 2x multiplicative Potency and Duration multiplier.
